name: Raymond J. BRITTON, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Britton v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Raymond J. BRITTON, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of July, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 494
Raymond J. BRITTON, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 18, 2006.
